name: Ski Hard: Lorsbruck 1978
description: Minimalist retro skiing. Hard. Physics based. Occasionally infuriating.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i3 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated graphics card recommended Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 760, AMD R9 360 or greater Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Nvidia GTX 970 or greater required for 4k @ 60 fps
